gov.ca.water.calgui.tech_service

Interface IFileSystemSvc

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemSvcImpl

    public interface IFileSystemSvc
    This is the interface for File Handling like reading and saving.
    Author:
    Mohan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileData(java.lang.String fileName, boolean isRequired)
      This will take the file name and return the lines in the file as list of strings.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileData(java.lang.String fileName, boolean isRequired, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> selector)
      This will take the file name and read the lines and then filter them based on the selector and return the lines.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileDataForTables(java.lang.String fileName)
      This will remove all the comment lines from the table file except the header line.
      java.lang.String getLookupFromTheFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method will return the lookup string from the file name.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileData

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileData(java.lang.String fileName,
                                             boolean isRequired)
                                      throws CalLiteGUIException
        This will take the file name and return the lines in the file as list of strings.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Full path and the file Name.
        isRequired - If file is required for the application to start and if the file is missing then it will throw the exception.
        Returns:
        return the lines in the file as list.
        Throws:
        CalLiteGUIException - It throws a general exception.

      • getFileData

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileData(java.lang.String fileName,
                                             boolean isRequired,
                                             java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> selector)
                                      throws CalLiteGUIException
        This will take the file name and read the lines and then filter them based on the selector and return the lines.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Full path and the file Name.
        isRequired - If file is required for the application to start and if the file is missing then it will exit the program. If not throw the exception.
        selector - The function which decide which lines to be in the result.
        Returns:
        Will return the list by removing all the line which don't satisfy the selector passed in.
        Throws:
        CalLiteGUIException - It throws a general exception.

      • getFileDataForTables

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileDataForTables(java.lang.String fileName)
                                               throws CalLiteGUIException
        This will remove all the comment lines from the table file except the header line.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Full path and the file Name.
        Returns:
        return the lines in the file as list after removing the comments.
        Throws:
        CalLiteGUIException - It throws a general exception.

      • saveDataToFile

        void saveDataToFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                    java.lang.String data)
             throws CalLiteGUIException
        This will save the given data into the given file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Full path and the file Name.
        data - The data which is writen to the file.
        Throws:
        CalLiteGUIException - It throws a general exception.

      • getXMLDocument

        org.w3c.dom.Document getXMLDocument()
                             throws CalLiteGUIException
        This will generate the Document from the XML file.
        Returns:
        Will return the generated document from the XML file.
        Throws:
        CalLiteGUIException - It throws a general exception.

      • getTheLookupFromTheFullFileName

        java.lang.String getTheLookupFromTheFullFileName(java.lang.String fullName)
        This method will return the lookup string from the full file path. This is only used for SWP and CVP. This will return user defined if the file name does't have any lookup value
        Parameters:
        fullName - Full path and the file Name.
        Returns:
        Will return the lookup string.

      • getLookupFromTheFileName

        java.lang.String getLookupFromTheFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method will return the lookup string from the file name. This is only used for SWP and CVP. This will return user defined if the file name does't have any lookup value
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file Name
        Returns:
        Will return the lookup string.
